          <title>
            <string language="fr">Satellites</string>
            <string language="en">Satellites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Satelliten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Satélites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Satelliti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δορυφόροι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Satélites</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que des satellites  peuvent être vus de la terre pendant la nuit de certaines positions dans le ciel.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that satellites can be seen from Earth during nighttime at certain positions in the sky.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Nuit</string>
            <string language="en">Night</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">satellite</string>
            <string language="en">satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Satelliten von der 
Masse während der Nachtzeit in bestimmten Positionen im Himmel 
gesehen werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os satélites podem 
ser vistos da terra durante o nighttime em determinadas posições no 
céu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i satelliti 
possono essere visti da terra durante la notte a determinate posizioni
nel cielo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι δορυφόροι μπορούν 
να δουν από τη γη κατά τη διάρκεια της νύχτας σε 
ορισμένες θέσεις στον ουρανό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los satélites se 
pueden ver de la tierra durante noche en ciertas posiciones en el 
cielo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Satellit</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">satellite</string>
          </keyword>
